explanation: [0-0] A little boy and a little girl are sitting on a large rock, with blurred mountains, blue sky, and white clouds in the distance. The girl has her hair in buns with pink hair clips, wearing a white top and red shorts. The boy is wearing a white sleeveless top and black pants.
[0-4] They are playfully pushing each other on the rock, when suddenly the boy pushes the girl a bit harder, causing her to tilt her head back and fall off the rock.

[4-7] The scene then switches to the girl falling through the air with her arms and legs spread out. The background is a vast expanse of sky, with blue skies in the distance and white clouds below.

[7-16] The scene shifts to a courtyard paved with concrete. Surrounded by a low wall made of red bricks, the courtyard features lush greenery in pots and a circular protruding concrete block on the ground. In the distance are white skies and green trees. A young man in a white T-shirt and black pants is sitting on a pink plastic chair, playing with his phone. Suddenly, he looks up at the sky, then stands up and walks to the protruding concrete block. Pointing his right hand towards the sky, he strikes a pose and transforms into a colorful object, flying up into the sky.
